content: Great! I'll have some time today to get some more low-hanging fruit off our resolved-change required pile (still 45 on there, yikes)!
Actually that includes some older ballot items from 2015? Guess those aren't for the IG... 38 logged against Genomics Reporting
Genomics Reporting is the IG? I tried to pull most of these into the spreadsheet I shared earlier today on the list serv.
Didn't mean to mention this here, the sheet looks good I'm making some comments there
